value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table?   In this video I will show you how to add a blank row for each group using power query in one step!  Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Lookup values from the same table in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to lookup a value in the same table using power Query.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going to write a function that calculates work hour (seconds) between two datetimes. Working hour by location, holidays will also be included :)  Link to Bills thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/f3fc729e-a2ec-409a-b20e-b5cf8ff5dc2a/calculate-work-hours-between-two-timedate-stamps?forum=powerquery

value.title: Add Custom Icons for Conditional Formatting in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this vlog. We will talk about how we can easily add the custom icons in Power BI Desktop for conditional formatting.  Sometimes there is a requirement in which we need to add the custom icons in Power BI Desktop. We can achieve this requirement using 4 simple steps.  1.Create or Download the Icons

value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
